item.title: Felix goes to #SPANC for the weekend
item.author: Laurence de Lussy Kubisa,
item.description: Lugging the recommended 200 copies of Felix, I skilfully avoided Friday rush hour and made my way to King’s Cross to attend the Student Publication Association National Conference (#SPANC) being hosted at Nottingham Trent University. Due to an administrative oversight (idiocy) tickets were …

item.title: At times, women are actively disliked
item.author: Laurence de Lussy Kubisa,
item.description: It might be hard to believe, but I actually started this article before Stephen Smith’s excellent article on sexism at Imperial and the superb piece on feminism by Veronica Gouvea. Stephen explored particular issues at Imperial and Veronica explained why feminism is important. I feel this piece is …

item.title: New library door, satisfaction skyrockets?
item.author: Laurence de Lussy Kubisa,
item.description: The new Library entrance was today unveiled in what is already being called a stunning coup for students. The entrance, which whilst still in the same place, now encompasses an incredible 3.75m2, will provide untold numbers with easier access to Imperial’s coveted study areas. It will certainly be a …

item.title: Give TfL a break
item.author: Laurence de Lussy Kubisa,
item.description: “Ah sorry I’m late, fucking Transport for London” – the familiar refrain uttered by thousands of Londoners every day. I mean it was obviously a failure of the bastards that you couldn’t make it to drinks/lectures/sessions of parliament on time. Right? WRONG. I say we all take a look at …
